project.Title: Darkest Soul Variety Project
project.ItemDescription:
The mod aims to expand the dark souls monster content in Darkest Dungeon. This mod is build around CarnifeX's Order of Sunlight, aiming to supplement the mod.
[h1]Features[/h1] - 1 mini-boss based on Warrior of Sunlight made by CarnifeX - 7 undead monsters themed after the hollows from Dark Souls
Most monsters are losely based on their Dark Souls counterparts which means that they have a simple parry mechanic and several Dark Souls inspired skills.
You will encounter these guys in all regions (pretty low chance). The Invader acts as a mini boss and will drop trinkets from 'Order of Sunlight'.
If you go on a mission with heroes that have the faction quirk you will have an increased chance of running into the Invader.
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Should be compatible with all mods as I use custom named files.
For it to play nice with other monster mods it's advised to add -disable_monster_pre_loading to your launch options in steam. This parameter makes it so it doesn't load all monster files at the start of the dungeon. This helps with loading times and crashes.
[h1]Load Order[/h1] Here is what my load order looks like in general: [Mods that overwrite vanilla files] [Quirk Mods] [Overhauls] Darkest Soul Variety Project Monster Variety Project [Monster Mods] [Mini-boss Mods] Order of Sunlight [Trinket Mods] [Classes] [Skins]
